definitions.definition: To (cause to) make a sudden forward movement (present participle: lunging ).
examples: I lunged at the police officer and made a grab for her gun.

definitions.definition: To longe or work a horse in a circle around a handler (present participle: lunging or lungeing ).

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To (cause to) make a sudden forward movement (present participle: lunging ).
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To longe or work a horse in a circle around a handler (present participle: lunging or lungeing ).
